fulltext:
Trinh Van Hoa 
 +84 906219891   |   
 hoatv214@gmail.com   |    
 vn.linkedin.com/in/hoatv214 
Experience____________________________________________________________________________________________ 
Datamart Solution Pte Ltd  
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam 
CO-FOUNDER 
Jun. 2017 – Now 
Main jobs 
• 
Lead all of product developement process to build PowerSell (powersell.com), a leading AI-driven multi-channel shop 
management solution which helps shop owners and retailers sell across the most popular e-commerce marketplace 
platforms in South East Asia. 
• 
Work with 16 staffs of 2 development teams: product team and engineering team.  
• 
Work with business partners (Lazada, Tiki, UOB, etc.) to provide data service and advise business solutions. 
• 
Lead Business Intelligence team of 5 staffs to build Datawarehouse and management reports for Regional Group. 
Achievements 
• 
Achieve 16,000 users in Vietnam, the Philipines, and Indonesia.  
• 
Best startup company in Vietnam in 2018, nominated by VnExpress. 
• 
Company valuation (Serie A) is $3,000,000, with over 50 staffs. 
Lazada Vietnam 
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam 
OPERATIONS STRATEGY & PLANNING 
Jun. 2016 – Jun. 2017 
Main jobs 
• 
Work with Warehouse, Customer Service and Transportation team to identify opportunities for leveraging company data 
to drive operation solutions. 
• 
Mine, analyze data from Lazada databases, and build internal tools to drive optimization and improvement of operation 
process. 
• 
Develop algorithm and data models for, i.e. calculation of new rate cart for LEL, new commission schema for new seller, 
box optimization, etc. 
Achievements 
• 
Nominate as the best staff in 2016Q4. 
• 
Develop and improve reseller detection algorithm, based on buying history and geography data, using semantic 
similarity algorithm to detect extra 10% of resellers.  
• 
Automate to process directly 75% of new orders without any manual check in order verification process.  
• 
Reduce 50% of reconciliation leadtime by building reconciliation tool for outbound team when handovering package to 
the 3PLs. 
• 
Cut off 30% leadtime of collecting items to pack and the package costs by developing ‘Box recommendation tool’ using 
clustering techniques and ‘Picklist tool’. 
Bournemouth University 
Bournemouth, England 
RESEARCH ASSISTANT 
Sep. 2015 – Jun. 2016 
Main jobs 
• 
Research on application of deep learning on image classification, recommender system and predictive models. 
• 
Run and test deep learning models, namely, deep belief nets, convolutional neural nets and other machine learning 
nets (e.g. Support vector machine, probabilistic neural network, Generalized Regression Neural Networks) to classify 
the wafer defect detection provided by Samsung Corporation, Korea. Achieved 86% of accuracy, which is higher than 
any current machine learning method for mixed pattern classification. 
• 
Build predictive model based on information on customers of an insurance company to predict who could be the 
potential customer by using Naive-Bayes Classification Algorithm and K-nearest neighbor algorithm. 
Techcombank – Head office 
Hanoi, Vietnam 
FINANCIAL & PLANNING ANALYSIS 
Aug. 2013 – Sep. 2015 
Main jobs 
• 
Build budgeting model for PFS (Personal financial Service), and help PFS division to calculate and forecast profit before 
tax in 2015 based on the current situation. 
• 
Join Virtual bank project team on behalf of PFS-BF (Personal Finance Service – Business Finance) member. The virtual 
bank project, which is consulted by the US experts, is to build a strategy for TCB to improve customer lifetime cycle. 
• 
Keep track the financial/Campaign performance of retail sector. 
Achievements 
• 
Excellent performance. Rating A1 - top approx. 1% highest performance among over 7000 Techcombank's staffs in 
2014.  
• 
Best support staff for business division in 2014. One of three staffs nominated for this award in 2014. 
• 
Best support staff for business division in 2014Q4. One of twelve staffs nominated for this award in 2014Q4. 
Education _____________________________________________________________________________________________ 
Bournemouth University 
Bournemouth, England 
M.Sc. IN APPLIED DATA ANALYTICS (Distinction) 
Sep. 2015 – Sep. 2016 
• 
BU Dean's Scholarship. Got BU Dean's Scholarship which is given to promising students in Faculty of Science & 
Technology. 
• 
Dynamo Challenge 2015 Winner. A business competition between 50 students from the universities of 
Bournemouth, Portsmouth, Southampton, Southampton Solent and Winchester. 
University of Stirling 
Stirling, Scotland 
B.Sc. IN INVESTMENT ANALYSIS (First Class) 
Sep. 2010 – Sep. 2013 
• 
Academic Scholarship. Got Department Scholarship which is given to promising students. 
Certificates___________________________________________________________________________________________ 
2013 
BAT Bloomberg Institute. Top 15 % of global business students - access result 
online at talentsearch.bloomberginstitute.com/profiles/B0081048 
Stirling, Scotland 
2013 
CFA Institute. CFA level 2 - Chartered Financial Analyst. Stop to take CFA level 3 
because it no longer supports my career path. 
Edinburgh, Scotland 
2012 
CFA Institute. CFA level 1 - Chartered Financial Analyst.  
London, England 
Skills ___________________________________________________________________________________________________ 
Analytics Skills: 
• 
Microsoft Excel with VBA, SQL, R, Weka, Matlab, Python (Theano, Keras, Lasagne, Tensorflow, Numpy, Scpicy and scikit-
learn), R (Shiny R, Shiny Dashboard and graph packages), Minitab, SAS, Datastream, SPSS. 
Technical Skills: 
• 
Backend: PHP, Bash, Linux, Redis, Solr, Beanstalk. 
• 
Web development: HTML, CSS, Javascript 
Project Management Skills: 
• 
Agile Scrum, Waterfall. 
Reference ____________________________________________________________________________________________ 
References are available on request

experiences.detail:
ain jobs
• Lead all of product developement process to build PowerSell (powersell.com), a leading AI-driven multi-channel shop management solution which helps shop owners and retailers sell across the most popular e-commerce marketplace platforms in South East Asia. • Work with 16 staffs of 2 development teams: product team and engineering team.
• Work with business partners (Lazada, Tiki, UOB, etc.) to provide data service and advise business solutions.
• Lead Business Intelligence team of 5 staffs to build Datawarehouse and management reports for Regional Group. Achievements • Achieve 16,000 users in Vietnam, the Philipines, and Indonesia. • Best startup company in Vietnam in 2018, nominated by VnExpress. • Company valuation (Serie A) is $3,000,000, with over 50 staffs.

Main jobs
• Work with Warehouse, Customer Service and Transportation team to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive operation solutions.
• Mine, analyze data from Lazada databases, and build internal tools to drive optimization and improvement of operation process.
• Develop algorithm and data models for, i.e. calculation of new rate cart for LEL, new commission schema for new seller, box optimization, etc.
Achievements • Nominate as the best staff in 2016Q4. • Develop and improve reseller detection algorithm, based on buying history and geography data, using semantic similarity algorithm to detect extra 10% of resellers.
• Automate to process directly 75% of new orders without any manual check in order verification process.
• Reduce 50% of reconciliation leadtime by building reconciliation tool for outbound team when handovering package to the 3PLs. • Cut off 30% leadtime of collecting items to pack and the package costs by developing ‘Box recommendation tool’ using clustering techniques and ‘Picklist tool’.

Main jobs
• Research on application of deep learning on image classification, recommender system and predictive models.
• Run and test deep learning models, namely, deep belief nets, convolutional neural nets and other machine learning nets (e.g. Support vector machine, probabilistic neural network, Generalized Regression Neural Networks) to classify the wafer defect detection provided by Samsung Corporation, Korea. Achieved 86% of accuracy, which is higher than any current machine learning method for mixed pattern classification.
• Build predictive model based on information on customers of an insurance company to predict who could be the potential customer by using Naive-Bayes Classification Algorithm and K-nearest neighbor algorithm.

Main jobs
• Build budgeting model for PFS (Personal financial Service), and help PFS division to calculate and forecast profit before tax in 2015 based on the current situation.
• Join Virtual bank project team on behalf of PFS-BF (Personal Finance Service - Business Finance) member. The virtual bank project, which is consulted by the US experts, is to build a strategy for TCB to improve customer lifetime cycle.
• Keep track the financial/Campaign performance of retail sector.
Achievements • Excellent performance. Rating A1 - top approx. 1% highest performance among over 7000 Techcombank's staffs in
2014. • Best support staff for business division in 2014. One of three staffs nominated for this award in 2014. • Best support staff for business division in 2014Q4. One of twelve staffs nominated for this award in 2014Q4.
